item.description:
Hi All,

Let's climb! I cannot do this on Friday, so I will be climbing on Thursday instead.

Please note, you will need to pass a belay test if you are an experienced climber but new to the gym. You should also take a class at Metrorock if you have never climbed before. Please call the gym in advance to make arrangements. Metrorock will charge you $16 for a daypass if you are not already a member or a punch card holder. For more information see:

http://www.metrorock....

The gym also has a shuttle to the gym from the T - Wellington Station if you don't have a car.

Hope to see some of you there!
Lopa

p.s. How to find me: I'll be the gal at the picnic table in black prAnA shorts and a green/red/blue shirt. I will wait till 7:15 pm and if you arrive after that you'll have to come find me. :) I will have a description of what I'm wearing on the whiteboard near the restrooms.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be the gal at the picnic table in black pants and a green/red/blue shirt. I will wait till 7:15 pm and if you arrive after that you'll have to come find me. :) I will have a description of what I'm wearing on the whiteboard near the restrooms.
item.why: It's fun! We usually go drinking and eating after.
item.name: Thursday night @ Metro
